description: Gets the configuration settings of an identity pool. This API can only be called with developer credentials. You cannot call this API with the temporary user credentials provided by Cognito Identity.

parameters.name: IdentityPoolId
parameters.description: A name-spaced GUID (for example, us-east-1:23EC4050-6AEA-7089-A2DD-08002EXAMPLE) created by Amazon Cognito. This is the ID of the pool for which to return a configuration.

nested_items.name: IdentityPoolId
nested_items.description: A name-spaced GUID (for example, us-east-1:23EC4050-6AEA-7089-A2DD-08002EXAMPLE) created by Amazon Cognito.

nested_items.name: ApplicationArns
nested_items.description: List of SNS platform application ARNs that could be used by clients.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: A role configured to allow Cognito to call SNS on behalf of the developer.

nested_items.name: CognitoStreams
nested_items.description: The name of the Cognito stream to receive updates. This stream must be in the developers account and in the same region as the identity pool.

nested_items.name: StreamingStatus
nested_items.description: ENABLED - Streaming of updates to identity pool is enabled.
